trans-unit.source: Represents a rectangle annotation.
trans-unit.target: 表示矩形註解。

trans-unit.source: A rectangle annotation can display text inside the rectangle, in addition to being displayed as a rectangle only.
trans-unit.target: 矩形註解可以顯示在矩形中，除了正顯示為矩形只內的文字。

trans-unit.source: So you can annotate using a rectangle or a rectangle with text inside it.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您可以標註具有文字內文中使用矩形。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationPathPoint"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationPathPoint"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the annotation type.
trans-unit.target: 取得註解類型。

trans-unit.source: For internal use, should not be used.
trans-unit.target: 供內部使用，應該不使用。

trans-unit.source: The annotation type.
trans-unit.target: 註解類型。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定註解的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value used to draw the annotation background.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>用來繪製註解背景的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the gradient style of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定註解的漸層樣式。

trans-unit.source: Two colors are used to draw the gradient, a primary color that is specified the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.RectangleAnnotation.BackColor%2A> and a secondary color that is specified with the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.RectangleAnnotation.BackSecondaryColor%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 兩個色彩來繪製所使用漸層，主要色彩，其指定<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.RectangleAnnotation.BackColor%2A>與指定<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.RectangleAnnotation.BackSecondaryColor%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.RectangleAnnotation.BackSecondaryColor%2A>與次要色彩</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.RectangleAnnotation.BackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle"></xref> value used to draw an annotation background.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle"> </xref>用來繪製註解背景的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the hatch style of an annotation background.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定註解背景的影線。

trans-unit.source: Two colors are used to draw the hatching, a primary color that is specified the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.RectangleAnnotation.BackColor%2A> property, and a secondary color that is specified with the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.RectangleAnnotation.BackColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 兩個色彩用來繪製影線，指定主要色彩<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.RectangleAnnotation.BackColor%2A>屬性，並使用指定的次要色彩<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.RectangleAnnotation.BackColor%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.RectangleAnnotation.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.RectangleAnnotation.BackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle"></xref> value used to draw the background.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle"> </xref>用來繪製背景的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the secondary color for an annotation background.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定註解背景次要色彩。

trans-unit.source: This color is used with <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.RectangleAnnotation.BackColor%2A> when the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.RectangleAnnotation.BackHatchStyle%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.RectangleAnnotation.BackGradientStyle%2A> property is used.
trans-unit.target: 此色彩會搭配<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.RectangleAnnotation.BackColor%2A>時<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.RectangleAnnotation.BackHatchStyle%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.RectangleAnnotation.BackGradientStyle%2A>屬性使用。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.RectangleAnnotation.BackGradientStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.RectangleAnnotation.BackHatchStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.RectangleAnnotation.BackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value used to draw the annotation background with hatching or gradient fill.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>用來繪製註解背景影線或漸層填滿的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the line color of an annotation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定註解的線條色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value used to draw the annotation line.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>用來繪製註解行尾的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the line style of an annotation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定註解的線條樣式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle"></xref> value used to draw the line style of an annotation.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle"> </xref>值用來繪製註解的線條樣式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the line width, in pixels, of an annotation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定線條的寬度，以像素的註解。

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value that represents the line width, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""> </xref>值，表示線條寬度，單位為像素。
